item.title: Triz-accept-harm
item.description: [name::accept-harm] [SpocWebEntityId::22287] [TrizPrinciple:: Triz-Convert_harm_into_benefit] Use harmful factors (particularly, harmful effects of the environment or surroundings) to achieve a positive effect.

item.title: Triz-accept-less
item.description: [name::accept-less] [SpocWebEntityId::22271] [TrizPrinciple:: Triz-Partial,_overdone,_or_excessive_action] If 100 percent of an object is hard to achieve using a given solution method then, by using ‘slightly less’ or ‘slightly more’ of the same method, the problem may be considerably easier to solve.

item.title: Triz-add-functions
item.description: [name::add-functions] [SpocWebEntityId::22294] [TrizPrinciple:: Triz-Self-service] Make an object serve itself by performing auxiliary helpful functions. Confidential Links & Embeds: Triz-add-functions Triz-add-functions.

item.title: Triz-add-oxygen
item.description: [name::add-oxygen] [SpocWebEntityId::22323] [TrizPrinciple:: Triz-Use_strong_oxidisers] Replace common air with oxygen-enriched air. Confidential Links & Embeds: Triz-add-oxygen Triz-add-oxygen.internal Triz-add-oxygen.

item.title: Triz-add-ozone
item.description: [name::add-ozone] [SpocWebEntityId::22327] [TrizPrinciple:: Triz-Use_strong_oxidisers] Replace ozonized (or ionized) oxygen with ozone. Confidential Links & Embeds: Triz-add-ozone Triz-add-ozone.internal Triz-add-ozone.

item.title: Triz-add-sensor
item.description: [name::add-sensor] [SpocWebEntityId::22300] [TrizPrinciple:: Triz-Replacement_of_a_mechanical_system] Replace a mechanical means with a sensory (optical, acoustic, taste or smell) means. Confidential Links & Embeds: Triz-add-sensor Triz-add-sensor.

item.title: Triz-add-structure
item.description: [name::add-structure] [SpocWebEntityId::22302] [TrizPrinciple:: Triz-Replacement_of_a_mechanical_system] Change from static to movable fields(in Space and / or Time), from random or unstructured fields to those having a certain Structure.

item.title: Triz-allow-pass
item.description: [name::allow-pass] [SpocWebEntityId::22253] [TrizPrinciple:: Triz-Nesting] Make one part pass through a cavity in the other. Confidential Links & Embeds: Triz-allow-pass Triz-allow-pass.

item.title: Triz-amplify-harm
item.description: [name::amplify-harm] [SpocWebEntityId::22289] [TrizPrinciple:: Triz-Convert_harm_into_benefit] Amplify a harmful factor to such a degree that it is no longer harmful. Confidential Links & Embeds: Triz-amplify-harm Triz-amplify-harm.

item.title: Triz-another-side
item.description: [name::another-side] [SpocWebEntityId::22275] [TrizPrinciple:: Triz-Moving_to_a_new_dimension] Use ‘another side’ of a given area. Confidential Links & Embeds: Triz-another-side Triz-another-side.internal Triz-another-side.

item.title: Triz-anti-stresses
item.description: [name::anti-stresses] [SpocWebEntityId::22257] [TrizPrinciple:: Triz-Prior_counteracion] Create beforehand stresses in an object that will oppose known undesirable working stresses later on. Confidential Links & Embeds: Triz-anti-stresses Triz-anti-stresses.

item.title: Triz-anticipate-change
item.description: [name::anticipate-change] [SpocWebEntityId::22258] [TrizPrinciple:: Triz-Prior_action] Perform, before it is needed, the required change of an object (either fully or partially). Confidential Links & Embeds: Triz-anticipate-change Triz-anticipate-change.

item.title: Triz-arrange-parts
item.description: [name::arrange-parts] [SpocWebEntityId::22259] [TrizPrinciple:: Triz-Prior_action] Pre-arrange objects such that they can come into action from the most convenient place and without losing time for their delivery.

item.title: Triz-asymmetrical
item.description: [name::asymmetrical] [SpocWebEntityId::22247] [TrizPrinciple:: Triz-Asymmetry] A. Change the shape of an object from symmetrical to asymmetrical. Confidential Links & Embeds: Triz-asymmetrical Triz-asymmetrical.

item.title: Triz-change-aggregate
item.description: [name::change-aggregate] [SpocWebEntityId::22316] [TrizPrinciple:: Triz-Transformation_of_physical_and_chemical_states_of_an_object] Change an Object’s aggregate State(e.g. to a Gas, Liquid, or Solid). Confidential Links & Embeds: Triz-change-aggregate Triz-change-aggregate.

item.title: Triz-change-color
item.description: [name::change-color] [SpocWebEntityId::22309] [TrizPrinciple:: Triz-Changing_the_color] Change the Color of an Object or its external Environment. Confidential Links & Embeds: Triz-change-color Triz-change-color.

item.title: Triz-change-consistency
item.description: [name::change-consistency] [SpocWebEntityId::22317] [TrizPrinciple:: Triz-Transformation_of_physical_and_chemical_states_of_an_object] Change the Concentration or Consistency. Confidential Links & Embeds: Triz-change-consistency Triz-change-consistency.internal Triz-change-consistency.protect Triz-change-consistency.

item.title: Triz-change-flexibility
item.description: [name::change-flexibility] [SpocWebEntityId::22318] [TrizPrinciple:: Triz-Transformation_of_physical_and_chemical_states_of_an_object] Change the Degree of Flexibility. Confidential Links & Embeds: Triz-change-flexibility Triz-change-flexibility.internal Triz-change-flexibility.protect Triz-change-flexibility.

item.title: Triz-change-frequency
item.description: [name::change-frequency] [SpocWebEntityId::22277] [TrizPrinciple:: Triz-Mechanical_vibration] Increase its frequency (even up to the ultrasonic). Confidential Links & Embeds: Triz-change-frequency Triz-change-frequency.

item.title: Triz-change-temperature
item.description: [name::change-temperature] [SpocWebEntityId::22319] [TrizPrinciple:: Triz-Transformation_of_physical_and_chemical_states_of_an_object] Change the temperature. Confidential Links & Embeds: Triz-change-temperature Triz-change-temperature.internal Triz-change-temperature.protect Triz-change-temperature.private Triz-change-temperature.

item.title: Triz-change-transparency
item.description: [name::change-transparency] [SpocWebEntityId::22310] [TrizPrinciple:: Triz-Changing_the_color] Change the Transparency of an Object or its external Environment. Confidential Links & Embeds: Triz-change-transparency Triz-change-transparency.

item.title: Triz-colored-tracer
item.description: [name::colored-tracer] [SpocWebEntityId::22311] [TrizPrinciple:: Triz-Changing_the_color] Use colored Additives to observe Objects or Processes which are difficult to see. Confidential Links & Embeds: Triz-colored-tracer Triz-colored-tracer.

item.title: Triz-combine-harm
item.description: [name::combine-harm] [SpocWebEntityId::22288] [TrizPrinciple:: Triz-Convert_harm_into_benefit] Eliminate the primary harmful action by adding it to another harmful action to resolve the problem.

item.title: Triz-combined-oscillations
item.description: [name::combined-oscillations] [SpocWebEntityId::22280] [TrizPrinciple:: Triz-Mechanical_vibration] Use combined ultrasonic and electromagnetic field oscillations. Confidential Links & Embeds: Triz-combined-oscillations Triz-combined-oscillations.internal Triz-combined-oscillations.

item.title: Triz-composite-materials
item.description: [name::composite-materials] [SpocWebEntityId::22331] [TrizPrinciple:: Triz-Composite_materials] Change from uniform to composite (multiple) materials. Confidential Links & Embeds: Triz-composite-materials Triz-composite-materials.internal Triz-composite-materials.

item.title: Triz-condition
item.description: [name::condition] [SpocWebEntityId::22245] [TrizPrinciple:: Triz-Local_quality] Make each part of an object function in conditions most suitable for its operation. Confidential Links & Embeds: Triz-condition Triz-condition.

item.title: Triz-continuous-load
item.description: [name::continuous-load] [SpocWebEntityId::22284] [TrizPrinciple:: Triz-Continuity_of_useful_action] Carry on work continuously; make all parts of an object work at full load, all the time.

item.title: Triz-control-harm
item.description: [name::control-harm] [SpocWebEntityId::22256] [TrizPrinciple:: Triz-Prior_counteracion] If it will be necessary to do an action with both harmful and useful effects, this action should be replaced with anti-actions to control harmful effects.

item.title: Triz-curved-shape
item.description: [name::curved-shape] [SpocWebEntityId::22265] [TrizPrinciple:: Triz-Spheroidality] Instead of using rectilinear parts, surfaces, or forms, use curvilinear ones; move from flat surfaces to spherical ones; from parts shaped as a cube (parallelepiped) to ball-shaped structures.

item.title: Triz-different
item.description: [name::different] [SpocWebEntityId::22246] [TrizPrinciple:: Triz-Local_quality] Make each part of an object fulfill a different and useful function. Confidential Links & Embeds: Triz-different Triz-different.

item.title: Triz-different-materials
item.description: [name::different-materials] [SpocWebEntityId::22322] [TrizPrinciple:: Triz-Thermal_expansion] If thermal expansion is being used, use multiple materials with different coefficients of thermal expansion. Confidential Links & Embeds: Triz-different-materials Triz-different-materials.

item.title: Triz-Disassemble
item.description: [name::Disassemble] [SpocWebEntityId::22241] [TrizPrinciple:: Triz-Segmentation] Make an object easy to disassemble. Confidential Links & Embeds: Triz-Disassemble Triz-Disassemble.internal Triz-Disassemble.

item.title: Triz-eliminate-idle
item.description: [name::eliminate-idle] [SpocWebEntityId::22285] [TrizPrinciple:: Triz-Continuity_of_useful_action] Eliminate all idle or intermittent actions or work. Confidential Links & Embeds: Triz-eliminate-idle Triz-eliminate-idle.

item.title: Triz-feedback
item.description: [name::feedback] [SpocWebEntityId::22290] [TrizPrinciple:: Triz-feedback] Introduce feedback (referring back, cross-checking) to improve a process or action. Confidential Links & Embeds: Triz-feedback Triz-feedback.

item.title: Triz-fractal-surface
item.description: [name::fractal-surface] [SpocWebEntityId::22308] [TrizPrinciple:: Triz-Use_of_porous_material] If an object is already porous, use the pores to introduce a useful substance or function. Fractal Structures like Pores have an infinite reactive Surface!

item.title: Triz-Fragment
item.description: [name::Fragment] [SpocWebEntityId::22242] [TrizPrinciple:: Triz-Segmentation] Increase the degree of fragmentation or segmentation. Confidential Links & Embeds: Triz-Fragment Triz-Fragment.internal Triz-Fragment.

item.title: Triz-high-speed
item.description: [name::high-speed] [SpocWebEntityId::22286] [TrizPrinciple:: Triz-Rushing_through] Conduct a process, or certain stages (e.g. destructible, harmful or hazardous operations) at high speed. Confidential Links & Embeds: Triz-high-speed Triz-high-speed.

item.title: Triz-increase-Asymmetry
item.description: [name::increase-Asymmetry] [SpocWebEntityId::22248] [TrizPrinciple:: Triz-Asymmetry] If an object is asymmetrical, increase its degree of asymmetry. Confidential Links & Embeds: Triz-increase-Asymmetry Triz-increase-Asymmetry.

item.title: Triz-inert-additives
item.description: [name::inert-additives] [SpocWebEntityId::22329] [TrizPrinciple:: Triz-Inert_environment] Add neutral parts, or inert additives to an object. Confidential Links & Embeds: Triz-inert-additives Triz-inert-additives.

item.title: Triz-inert-environment
item.description: [name::inert-environment] [SpocWebEntityId::22328] [TrizPrinciple:: Triz-Inert_environment] Replace a normal environment with an inert one. Confidential Links & Embeds: Triz-inert-environment Triz-inert-environment.

item.title: Triz-intermediary
item.description: [name::intermediary] [SpocWebEntityId::22292] [TrizPrinciple:: Triz-Mediator] Use an intermediary carrier article or intermediary process. Confidential Links & Embeds: Triz-intermediary Triz-intermediary.

item.title: Triz-invert-action
item.description: [name::invert-action] [SpocWebEntityId::22262] [TrizPrinciple:: Triz-Inversion] Invert the action(s) used to solve the problem (e.g. instead of cooling an object, heat it).

item.title: Triz-ionized-oxygen
item.description: [name::ionized-oxygen] [SpocWebEntityId::22326] [TrizPrinciple:: Triz-Use_strong_oxidisers] Use ionized oxygen. Confidential Links & Embeds: Triz-ionized-oxygen Triz-ionized-oxygen.internal Triz-ionized-oxygen.protect Triz-ionized-oxygen.private Triz-ionized-oxygen.

item.title: Triz-ionizing
item.description: [name::ionizing] [SpocWebEntityId::22325] [TrizPrinciple:: Triz-Use_strong_oxidisers] Expose air or oxygen to ionizing radiation. Confidential Links & Embeds: Triz-ionizing Triz-ionizing.internal Triz-ionizing.

item.title: Triz-isolate
item.description: [name::isolate] [SpocWebEntityId::22306] [TrizPrinciple:: Triz-Flexible_film_or_thin_membranes] Isolate the object from the external Environment using flexible shells and thin films. Confidential Links & Embeds: Triz-isolate Triz-isolate.

item.title: Triz-limit-changes
item.description: [name::limit-changes] [SpocWebEntityId::22261] [TrizPrinciple:: Triz-Equipotentiality] In a potential field, limit position changes (e.g. change operating conditions to eliminate the need to raise or lower objects in a gravity field).

item.title: Triz-luminescent-tracer
item.description: [name::luminescent-tracer] [SpocWebEntityId::22312] [TrizPrinciple:: Triz-Changing_the_color] If such Additives are already used, employ luminescent Traces or Tracer Elements. Confidential Links & Embeds: Triz-luminescent-tracer Triz-luminescent-tracer.

item.title: Triz-merge-identical
item.description: [name::merge-identical] [SpocWebEntityId::22249] [TrizPrinciple:: Triz-Combining_(Integration)] Bring closer together (or merge) identical or similar objects, assemble identical or similar parts to perform parallel operations.

item.title: Triz-merge-in-space
item.description: [name::merge-in-space] [SpocWebEntityId::22252] [TrizPrinciple:: Triz-Nesting] Place one object inside another; place each object, in turn, inside the other. Confidential Links & Embeds: Triz-merge-in-space Triz-merge-in-space.

item.title: Triz-merge-in-time
item.description: [name::merge-in-time] [SpocWebEntityId::22250] [TrizPrinciple:: Triz-Combining_(Integration)] Make operations contiguous or parallel; bring them together in time. Confidential Links & Embeds: Triz-merge-in-time Triz-merge-in-time.

item.title: Triz-merge-temporarily
item.description: [name::merge-temporarily] [SpocWebEntityId::22293] [TrizPrinciple:: Triz-Mediator] Merge one object temporarily with another (which can be easily removed). Confidential Links & Embeds: Triz-merge-temporarily Triz-merge-temporarily.

item.title: Triz-movability
item.description: [name::movability] [SpocWebEntityId::22263] [TrizPrinciple:: Triz-Inversion] Make movable parts (or the external environment) fixed, and fixed parts movable). Confidential Links & Embeds: Triz-movability Triz-movability.

item.title: Triz-movable-part
item.description: [name::movable-part] [SpocWebEntityId::22270] [TrizPrinciple:: Triz-Dynamicity] If an object (or process) is rigid or inflexible, make it movable or adaptive. Confidential Links & Embeds: Triz-movable-part Triz-movable-part.

item.title: Triz-movable-parts
item.description: [name::movable-parts] [SpocWebEntityId::22269] [TrizPrinciple:: Triz-Dynamicity] Divide an object into parts capable of movement relative to each other. Confidential Links & Embeds: Triz-movable-parts Triz-movable-parts.

item.title: Triz-move-in-space
item.description: [name::move-in-space] [SpocWebEntityId::22272] [TrizPrinciple:: Triz-Moving_to_a_new_dimension] To move an object in two- or three-dimensional space. Confidential Links & Embeds: Triz-move-in-space Triz-move-in-space.

item.title: Triz-multi-story
item.description: [name::multi-story] [SpocWebEntityId::22273] [TrizPrinciple:: Triz-Moving_to_a_new_dimension] Use a multi-story arrangement of objects instead of a single-story arrangement. Confidential Links & Embeds: Triz-multi-story Triz-multi-story.

item.title: Triz-multi-urpose
item.description: [name::multi-urpose] [SpocWebEntityId::22251] [TrizPrinciple:: Triz-Universality] Make a part or object perform multiple functions; eliminate the need for other parts. Confidential Links & Embeds: Triz-multi-urpose Triz-multi-urpose.

item.title: Triz-non-uniform
item.description: [name::non-uniform] [SpocWebEntityId::22244] [TrizPrinciple:: Triz-Local_quality] Change an object’s structure from uniform to non-uniform, change an external environment (or external influence) from uniform to non-uniform.

item.title: Triz-optimal-conditions
item.description: [name::optimal-conditions] [SpocWebEntityId::22268] [TrizPrinciple:: Triz-Dynamicity] Allow (or design) the characteristics of an object, external environment, or process to change to be optimal or to find an optimal operating condition.

item.title: Triz-Partition
item.description: [name::Partition] [SpocWebEntityId::22240] [TrizPrinciple:: Triz-Segmentation] Divide an object into independent parts. Confidential Links & Embeds: Triz-Partition Triz-Partition.internal Triz-Partition.

item.title: Triz-periodic-action
item.description: [name::periodic-action] [SpocWebEntityId::22281] [TrizPrinciple:: Triz-Periodic_action] Instead of continuous action, use periodic or pulsating actions. Confidential Links & Embeds: Triz-periodic-action Triz-periodic-action.

item.title: Triz-phase-transition
item.description: [name::phase-transition] [SpocWebEntityId::22320] [TrizPrinciple:: Triz-Phase_transition] Use phenomena occurring during phase transitions (e.g. volume changes, loss or absorption of heat, etc.). Confidential Links & Embeds: Triz-phase-transition Triz-phase-transition.

item.title: Triz-piezo-electric
item.description: [name::piezo-electric] [SpocWebEntityId::22279] [TrizPrinciple:: Triz-Mechanical_vibration] Use piezoelectric vibrators instead of mechanical ones. Confidential Links & Embeds: Triz-piezo-electric Triz-piezo-electric.internal Triz-piezo-electric.

item.title: Triz-porous
item.description: [name::porous] [SpocWebEntityId::22307] [TrizPrinciple:: Triz-Use_of_porous_material] Make an object porous or add porous Elements (inserts, coatings, etc.). This reduces Material Consumption while keeping Stability Properties.

item.title: Triz-prepare-emergency
item.description: [name::prepare-emergency] [SpocWebEntityId::22260] [TrizPrinciple:: Triz-Cushion_in_advance] Prepare emergency means beforehand to compensate for the relatively low reliability of an object. Confidential Links & Embeds: Triz-prepare-emergency Triz-prepare-emergency.

item.title: Triz-pure-oxygen
item.description: [name::pure-oxygen] [SpocWebEntityId::22324] [TrizPrinciple:: Triz-Use_strong_oxidisers] Replace enriched air with pure oxygen. Confidential Links & Embeds: Triz-pure-oxygen Triz-pure-oxygen.internal Triz-pure-oxygen.

item.title: Triz-removed-obsolete
item.description: [name::removed-obsolete] [SpocWebEntityId::22314] [TrizPrinciple:: Triz-Rejecting_and_regenerating_parts] Make Portions of an Object that have fulfilled their Functions go away (discard by dissolving, evaporating, etc.

item.title: Triz-replace-by-multiple
item.description: [name::replace-by-multiple] [SpocWebEntityId::22299] [TrizPrinciple:: Triz-An_inexpensive_short-life_object_instead_of_an_expensive_durable_one] Replace an inexpensive object with a multiple of inexpensive objects, comprising certain qualities (such as service life, for instance).

item.title: Triz-resonate
item.description: [name::resonate] [SpocWebEntityId::22278] [TrizPrinciple:: Triz-Mechanical_vibration] Use an object’s resonant frequency. Confidential Links & Embeds: Triz-resonate Triz-resonate.internal Triz-resonate.protect Triz-resonate.

item.title: Triz-restore-consumable
item.description: [name::restore-consumable] [SpocWebEntityId::22315] [TrizPrinciple:: Triz-Rejecting_and_regenerating_parts] Conversely, restore consumable parts of an object directly in operation. Confidential Links & Embeds: Triz-restore-consumable Triz-restore-consumable.

item.title: Triz-same-material
item.description: [name::same-material] [SpocWebEntityId::22313] [TrizPrinciple:: Triz-Homogeneity] Make Objects interacting with a given object of the same material (or material with identical properties).

item.title: Triz-Separate
item.description: [name::Separate] [SpocWebEntityId::22243] [TrizPrinciple:: Triz-Extraction] Separate an interfering part or property from an object, or single out the only. Confidential Links & Embeds: Triz-Separate Triz-Separate.

item.title: Triz-thermal-expansion
item.description: [name::thermal-expansion] [SpocWebEntityId::22321] [TrizPrinciple:: Triz-Thermal_expansion] Use thermal expansion (or contraction) of materials. Confidential Links & Embeds: Triz-thermal-expansion Triz-thermal-expansion.internal Triz-thermal-expansion.

item.title: Triz-tilt
item.description: [name::tilt] [SpocWebEntityId::22274] [TrizPrinciple:: Triz-Moving_to_a_new_dimension] Tilt or re-orient the object, lay it on its side. Confidential Links & Embeds: Triz-tilt Triz-tilt.

item.title: Triz-upside-down
item.description: [name::upside-down] [SpocWebEntityId::22264] [TrizPrinciple:: Triz-Inversion] Turn the object (or process) ‘upside down’. Confidential Links & Embeds: Triz-upside-down Triz-upside-down.internal Triz-upside-down.

item.title: Triz-use-balls
item.description: [name::use-balls] [SpocWebEntityId::22266] [TrizPrinciple:: Triz-Spheroidality] Use rollers, balls, spirals, domes. Confidential Links & Embeds: Triz-use-balls Triz-use-balls.internal Triz-use-balls.protect Triz-use-balls.

item.title: Triz-use-copies
item.description: [name::use-copies] [SpocWebEntityId::22296] [TrizPrinciple:: Triz-Copying] Instead of an unavailable, expensive, fragile object, use simpler and inexpensive copies. Confidential Links & Embeds: Triz-use-copies Triz-use-copies.

item.title: Triz-use-EM-Field
item.description: [name::use-EM-Field] [SpocWebEntityId::22301] [TrizPrinciple:: Triz-Replacement_of_a_mechanical_system] Use electric, magnetic and electromagnetic fields to interact with the object. Confidential Links & Embeds: Triz-use-EM-Field Triz-use-EM-Field.

item.title: Triz-use-field
item.description: [name::use-field] [SpocWebEntityId::22303] [TrizPrinciple:: Triz-Replacement_of_a_mechanical_system] Use fields in conjunction with field-activated (e.g. ferromagnetic) particles. Confidential Links & Embeds: Triz-use-field Triz-use-field.

item.title: Triz-use-films
item.description: [name::use-films] [SpocWebEntityId::22305] [TrizPrinciple:: Triz-Flexible_film_or_thin_membranes] Use flexible shells and thin films instead of three dimensional structures. Confidential Links & Embeds: Triz-use-films Triz-use-films.

item.title: Triz-use-fluid
item.description: [name::use-fluid] [SpocWebEntityId::22304] [TrizPrinciple:: Triz-Use_a_pneumatic_or_hydralic_construction] Use gas and liquid parts of an object instead of solid parts (e.g. inflatable, filled with liquids, air cushion, hydrostatic, hydro-reactive).

item.title: Triz-use-IR-UV-copies
item.description: [name::use-IR-UV-copies] [SpocWebEntityId::22298] [TrizPrinciple:: Triz-Copying] If visible optical copies are already used, move to infrared or ultraviolet copies. Confidential Links & Embeds: Triz-use-IR-UV-copies Triz-use-IR-UV-copies.

item.title: Triz-use-optical-copies
item.description: [name::use-optical-copies] [SpocWebEntityId::22297] [TrizPrinciple:: Triz-Copying] Replace an object, or process with optical copies. Confidential Links & Embeds: Triz-use-optical-copies Triz-use-optical-copies.

item.title: Triz-use-pauses
item.description: [name::use-pauses] [SpocWebEntityId::22283] [TrizPrinciple:: Triz-Periodic_action] Use pauses between impulses to perform a different action. Confidential Links & Embeds: Triz-use-pauses Triz-use-pauses.

item.title: Triz-use-rotation
item.description: [name::use-rotation] [SpocWebEntityId::22267] [TrizPrinciple:: Triz-Spheroidality] Go from linear to rotary motion, use centrifugal forces. Confidential Links & Embeds: Triz-use-rotation Triz-use-rotation.

item.title: Triz-use-waste
item.description: [name::use-waste] [SpocWebEntityId::22295] [TrizPrinciple:: Triz-Self-service] Use waste resources, energy, or substances. Confidential Links & Embeds: Triz-use-waste Triz-use-waste.internal Triz-use-waste.

item.title: Triz-Vacuum
item.description: [name::Vacuum] [SpocWebEntityId::22330] [TrizPrinciple:: Triz-Inert_environment] Perform the Operation in Vacuum. Confidential Links & Embeds: Triz-Vacuum Triz-Vacuum.internal Triz-Vacuum.protect Triz-Vacuum.

item.title: Triz-vary-feedback
item.description: [name::vary-feedback] [SpocWebEntityId::22291] [TrizPrinciple:: Triz-feedback] If feedback is already used, change its magnitude or influence. Confidential Links & Embeds: Triz-vary-feedback Triz-vary-feedback.

item.title: Triz-vary-oscillations
item.description: [name::vary-oscillations] [SpocWebEntityId::22282] [TrizPrinciple:: Triz-Periodic_action] If an action is already periodic, change the periodic magnitude or frequency. Confidential Links & Embeds: Triz-vary-oscillations Triz-vary-oscillations.

item.title: Triz-vibrate
item.description: [name::vibrate] [SpocWebEntityId::22276] [TrizPrinciple:: Triz-Mechanical_vibration] Cause an object to oscillate or vibrate. Confidential Links & Embeds: Triz-vibrate Triz-vibrate.internal Triz-vibrate.

item.title: Triz-weight-environment
item.description: [name::weight-environment] [SpocWebEntityId::22255] [TrizPrinciple:: Triz-Counterweight] To compensate for the weight of an object, make it interact with the environment (e.g. use aerodynamic, hydrodynamic, buoyancy and other forces).

item.title: Triz-weigt-lift
item.description: [name::weigt-lift] [SpocWebEntityId::22254] [TrizPrinciple:: Triz-Counterweight] To compensate for the weight of an object, merge it with other objects that provide lift.
